hackathon-description-text: After an overwhelming feedback last year at Hackaburg 2016, the whole Hackaburg-Team, our professors and the President of the OTH knew, there must be a Hackaburg 2017. So we started in September with the preparations to bring again a great Hackathon to Regensburg and to you! We are thrilled to not just make Hackaburg happen again but to also use the experience from our first year, to bring Hackaburg 2017 to a whole new level!
hackathon-rules:
We have two major rules:
You're free to brainstorm ideas or plan your project beforehand, but to be eligible for prizes, all code outside of open source libraries must be written at the event. Your idea has to be one you haven't worked on in advance. If you use code written specifically for your idea in advance, you are not eligible for juding and therefore prices.
in accordance to the

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Spend one day on a racetrack in the super sports car R8.
HORSCH Maschinen GmbH is offering the second prize for Hackaburg 2017 with 500 €. The price is paid in cash to the team.
As third price we provide 5 Amazon Echo Dots, Amazon’s speach interface, worth 60€ each.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: THIRD PRICE: 5 x Amazon Echo Dot
Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-description-header: The second Hackathon at OTH Regensburg
